Men Dont let the dreaded approaching holiday of hearts intimidate you PERIOD

Thats right Valentines Day is right around the corner PERIOD You have seven days or fewer to find that perfect gift for your perfect someone PERIOD Whether youre a first time buyer or an expert here are a few tips to ease and guide you through the process PERIOD

Tip  Good jewelry can be found downtown PERIOD

Employee Jamie Bauman at Moyer Jewelers Inc.  E PERIOD College Ave. said only a couple of students have been in the store looking for gifts PERIOD

 Bauman said PERIOD 

While the store is not having any kind of Valentines Day special Bauman said the store always tries to keep its prices as low as possible PERIOD

 Bauman said PERIOD 

Another popular gift idea is the Pandora bracelet Bauman said PERIOD It is a Danish charm bracelet to which girls can add match and mix charms PERIOD

 Bauman said PERIOD

Tip  Thoughtful cards are not overlooked PERIOD

At Isabellas Hallmark  E PERIOD College Ave. employee Tiffany Morgan sophomoreanimal science said the stores cards are especially unique PERIOD  she said PERIOD 

Employee Suzie Brinch seniorhotel restaurant and institute management said the store also provides a wide variety of possible gifts for students for the holiday PERIOD

 Brink said PERIOD The store also carries many types of paintbrushes edible lotions and for the more adventurous giftseeker PERIOD

Tip  Flowers are classy PERIOD

At Woodrings Floral Gardens  S PERIOD Allen St. employee Michael Albright said a large number of students order flowers in advance but a lot of students also come in on Valentines Day too PERIOD  Albright said PERIOD 

While the store carries all sorts of flowers ranging from lilies daffodils daisies and tulips there is one flower that beats out the rest PERIOD

 Albright said PERIOD 

Although the rose might be the most traditional flower it may not be the most economical said owner Allen Baney of Avant Garden  E PERIOD Calder Way PERIOD

 Baney said PERIOD 

Tip  Create your own box of chocolate PERIOD

Paul Jensen Jr. owner of Chocolate Madness  E PERIOD Calder Way said the store is stocked and ready for the Valentines Day buyers PERIOD For anyone ordering chocolate strawberries Jensen said students must preorder them by Feb PERIOD  PERIOD All other chocolate items are on a firstcome firstserve basis PERIOD

 Jensen said PERIOD 

The store will be selling a premade box of chocolate which contains two peanut butter hearts and four pieces of heartshaped milk chocolate for about  PERIOD Also the store has many other items to fill a gift basket with Jensen said PERIOD

 he added PERIOD

Tip  Lingerie doesnt have to be complicated PERIOD

Jessie Stover of Jezebels Boutique located on  E PERIOD College Ave. said from  to  p.m PERIOD Thursday Jezebels will be having their first Mens Night to allow male shoppers to purchase gifts for their female counterparts PERIOD

 Stover said PERIOD 

Girls can come in and fill out Jezebels registry any time and this way her boyfriend or friends know exactly what she wants Stover said PERIOD

 she said PERIOD Stover also said the store carries hankypanky silk roses for Valentines Day which consists of a silk rose with a thong wrapped over the flower petals PERIOD Besides the basic lingerie the store also carries sleepwear bath and body lotion slippers and body fondues PERIOD
